items.name: 创建矢量
items.description: Adds a CreateVector block with three literals set as 0

items.name: 人物方向
items.description: A subroutine block that calculates the necessary yaw of player or vehicle for teleporting in order to face in the direction of the given object/position-vector

items.name: Bounce Back Player
items.description: Adds two subroutines which enable bouncing back a player in the opposite direction of his current movement

items.name: 显示自定义消息
items.description: Adds an example DisplayCustomMessage block for the header slot

items.name: 循环变量
items.description: Adds a simple loop from 0 to 9 by 1

items.name: 循环变量 (计数)
items.description: Adds a simple loop from 0 to CountOf() by 1

items.name: 索引变量
items.description: Adds a complex set of rules and a tick subroutine which is called by every server-tick

items.name: 同时模块
items.description: Adds a while-loop with a wait block

items.name: 获取地图坐标
items.description: Adds a rule to continuously display the current players position in the header message

items.name: 获取玩家状态布尔值
items.description: Adds a pre-filled GetPlayerState block with EventPlayer and PlayerState(Bool) selection value

items.name: 获取玩家状态数量
items.description: Adds a pre-filled GetPlayerState block with EventPlayer and PlayerState(Number) selection value

items.name: 获取玩家状态矢量
items.description: Adds a pre-filled GetPlayerState block with EventPlayer and PlayerState(Vector) selection value

items.name: Execute Every Second (Global)
items.description: Adds two rules and one subroutine that is executed every second in the global context

items.name: Execute Every Second (Player)
items.description: Adds two rules and one subroutine that is executed every second in each player context

items.name: Execute Every Second (Team)
items.description: Adds two rules and one subroutine that is executed every second for each team

items.name: Display Remaining Time (mm:ss)
items.description: Adds a subroutine which will display the remaining game mode time in the format of mm:ss

items.name: Teamswitch Utility
items.description: Adds a set of rules to enable teamswitch
